mapper.select: update INSBFlowlogs set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},flowinfoid = #{flowinfoid},taskid = #{taskid},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},currenthandle = #{currenthandle},flowcode = #{flowcode},flowname = #{flowname},firoredi = #{firoredi},fromwhere = #{fromwhere},count = #{count},taskstatus = #{taskstatus} where id = #{id}
